title: Placement System
body: Dont post that often.. after clarification on what happens in the placement games cause i am at a loss trying to understand it.. ok i finished season 4 in bronze 3 so in my 10 placement games for season 5 i won 7 out of 10 games 2 of those losses due to afks when i finished placement games i was put in bronze 5... if someone could explain or add their opinon would be greatly appreciated

replies.body:
People don't understand, the placements aren't directly related to what you were last season. They just decide who you're matched against.

But anyway, the way it works is that it judges your estimated mmr based on those ten matches, and then places you a bit lower than that. If you had the estimated mmr of a bronze III player when you finished your placements, then you'd probably be placed into bronze V.

Winning seven out of ten games seems like it would bring that result.
